body.p:
HCON 20 IH
113th CONGRESS
1st Session
H. CON. RES. 20
Permitting the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony to award the Congressional Gold Medal to Professor Muhamad Yunus.
IN.Con.Res.20

center.p:
AT THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES
March 4, 2013Mr. HOLT submitted the following concurrent resolution; which was referred to the CommitteeFIRST SESSION

body.p:
Begun and held at the City of Washington on House Administration
CONCURRENT RESOLUTION
Permitting the use of the rotunda of the Capitol for a ceremony to award the Congressional Gold Medal to Professor Muhamad Yunus.Thursday,

inserted.p: the third day of January, two thousand and thirteen

p.em: Resolved by the House of Representatives (the Senate concurring),

body.h3: SECTION 1. USE OF ROTUNDA FOR CEREMONY TO AWARD CONGRESSIONAL GOLD MEDAL TO PROFESSOR MUHAMMAD YUNUS.

ul.p: The rotunda of the Capitol is authorized to be used on April 17, 2013, for a ceremony to award the Congressional Gold Medal to Professor Muhammad Yunus in recognition of his contributions to the fight against global poverty. Physical preparations for the ceremony shall be carried out in accordance with such conditions as the Architect of the Capitol may prescribe.

inserted.p: Clerk of the House of Representatives.
